ca.carleton.sysc3110.project.models.levels

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.carleton.sysc3110.project.models.levels.Level
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelTheFirst

    public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the constant parameters that define a level
